{
  nome: '#string',
  email: '#regex .+@.+\\..+',
  password: '#string',
  administrador: '#string',
  _id: '#string'
}

steps.name: match each response.usuarios contains { administrador: '#regex true|false' }

steps.name: def admins = karate.filter(response.usuarios, function(x){ return x.administrador == 'true' })
